titles.title: Worthy Is The Lamb, Worthy Is The Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy is the Lamb,
Worthy is the Lamb, worthy is the Lamb,
Worthy is the Lamb that was slain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus is the Lamb, Jesus is the Lamb,
Jesus is the Lamb, Jesus is the Lamb that was slain.
Glory to the Lamb, glory to the Lamb,
Glory to the Lamb, glory to the Lamb that was slain.
